device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
scale: Room; Near, personal space; Social space
use_cases_desc: meeting room collaboration with laptops and projected display
contribution_desc:
This poster paper presents an interaction technique called WinCuts that allows users to replicate a live, interactive region of the source window and to share this new dependent window to another device (e.g., projected display).

Contribution: "cross-device" -> "interaction technique" -> "UI distribution"
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; UI distribution; Remote control
toolkits: Win32 Graphics Device Interface (GDI) API; C++; .NET
